abstract: The Senate may be extending a tax credit to any investment in high-speed Internet service, which could save Verizon $1 billion in taxes.
snippet: The Senate may be extending a tax credit to any investment in high-speed Internet service, which could save Verizon $1 billion in taxes.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE: Verizon has posted its thoughts on the broadband stimulus on its policy blog.

headline.main: Verizon Could Get $1.6 Billion in Senate Stimulus Plan
